definition: specimen/sample/the root cause and symptoms of a disease

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
type specimen (used to define a species)

sentences.english: A biological worker always makes it a point to record the time when a specimen in collected .
sentences.chinese: 生物工作者必定記下采得標本的時間。

sentences.english: The soil sample came from a trench approximately 2 inches deep.
sentences.chinese: 土壤標本來自於一個大概2寸深的溝渠。

sentences.english: The designated holotype species has not been found.
sentences.chinese: 此種模式標本已不存在。

sentences.english: Frosted slides are sandblasted for marking specimens.
sentences.chinese: 磨砂的載玻片經噴砂處理以標記標本。

sentences.english: Mimic operation was performed on one side of fresh specimen.
sentences.chinese: 一側新鮮標本上，摹擬術式設計。

sentences.english: Ex-situ conservation has also been conducted. Some living specimens are planted in the Shing Mun Arboretum .
sentences.chinese: 漁護署已進行遷地保護，城門標本林內有栽培。

sentences.english: The samples of Agkistrodon from high altitude regions of both Gansu and Shaanxi Provinces probably should be referred to A. strauchi.
sentences.chinese: 甘肅和陝西高海拔地區的蝮蛇標本可能同屬於高原蝮。

sentences.english: Abnormal obturator artery was studied on 148 sides of specimens.
sentences.chinese: 報道了148側屍體標本上異常閉孔動脈的觀察結果。

sentences.english: The examined specimens are deposited in the Institute of Entomology, Shenyang Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 研究標本保存於瀋陽師範大學昆蟲研究所。

sentences.english: The intertubercular sulcus was observed on 60 specimen of humerus.
sentences.chinese: 並在60例骨性標本上，對結節間溝進行觀測。

sentences.english: Notre-Dame de Paris is, in particular, a curious specimen of this variety.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎聖母院尤其是這種變化的一個奇特的標本。

sentences.english: Soleus muscle of two lower limbs was harvested at 7 weeks old.
sentences.chinese: 在7周齡時，解剖取出兩下肢的比目魚肌作標本。

sentences.english: During her lifetime, she assembled a collection of pressed plants in a sixty-six page leather-bound herbarium.
sentences.chinese: 她曾將壓花收集到一本66頁的皮製封面的標本集中。

sentences.english: Methods The specimens of ticks were collected with white cloth from grassland and picked from animals' body surface.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用布旗法和動物體表採集法採獲蜱類標本。

sentences.english: Its natural-history museum alone holds 12m specimens.
sentences.chinese: 單是該校自然歷史博物館便藏有1200萬份標本。
